chart.title: Total number of people affected by extreme temperatures
chart.subtitle: Extreme temperatures include both heatwaves and cold waves. The total number of people affected is the sum of injured, requiring assistance and homeless.
chart.note: Data includes disasters recorded up to October 2025.
